name: Relace
headline: End-to-end fine tuning and inference for open source LLMs
description: Relace makes it easy for startups to fine tune and host LLMs for domain-specific tasks. We beat SOTA models on performance and speed by providing an opinionated, all-in-one fine tuning and inference stack.

founders.name: Preston Zhou, Founder
founders.description: I'm interested in working on AI/ML tech and fun technical problems. Have a soft spot for physics.

founders.name: Eitan Borgnia, Founder
founders.description: I help people get the most out of their language models. Former PhD student in machine learning at UChicago, with a math degree from Caltech.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Relace**

Founded in 2022 and a proud member of Y Combinator’s W23 batch, Relace aims to revolutionize the process of fine-tuning and deploying open-source large language models (LLMs) for specific domains. Located in the heart of San Francisco, this nimble team of two emphasizes a frictionless experience, making it incredibly easy for startups to fine-tune and host LLMs tailored to their unique needs.

### Mission
Relace’s mission is clear: to provide an end-to-end solution for fine-tuning and inference of open-source LLMs. Their platform allows users to easily adjust models to outperform state-of-the-art (SOTA) benchmarks—both in performance and speed.

### Services
Relace’s approach is all about simplicity and effectiveness. Their services include:
- **Training**: Users can employ default training hyperparameters or customize their own with support from Relace’s machine learning engineers.
- **Deployment**: Each model deployment is optimized for specific tasks, with options for dedicated GPU resources or autoscaled deployments.
- **Capture**: Relace facilitates the capturing of datasets at the application level, helping users gather and utilize data efficiently.

### Competitive Edge
What sets Relace apart is not just the technology itself but how accessible they make it. With just a few extra lines of code, developers can integrate highly specialized LLM capabilities into their applications. This simplicity, combined with the power of custom models, offers a competitive advantage for startups needing rapid deployment.

### Team and Investors
Relace is backed by notable entities like Y Combinator, Pioneer Fund, Amino Capital, and L2 Ventures. Lead by Group Partner Brad Flora, Relace is poised to disrupt the market with a robust framework designed specifically for developers.

### Get Involved
Interested parties can explore their offerings on their [website](https://relace.ai) or sign up for a free trial. For those seeking a deeper understanding or wanting to chat about their specific needs, booking an introductory call is just a click away.

In a world where AI continues to evolve rapidly, Relace stands as an approachable solution for startups eager to harness the power of LLMs without the traditional complexities.
